mods.abstract: A caricature of two male busts of professional types, both three quarter turned to the picture plane. Both figures are dressed in cap and gown and have elongated faces. Both figures wear pince-nez glasses and each man has small, pursed lips with thinmoustaches. The tassel hanging off of each man's mortar board terminates in a bug-like pendant.
mods.note: *This is perhaps an artist's proof because Miss Lamey's thesis claims that there was an edition of 6

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
